original_text: for he was a good man, full of the Holy Spirit and of faith. And a great many people were added to the Lord.
korean_text: 바나바는 착한 사람이요 성령과 믿음이 충만한 사람이라 이에 큰 무리가 주께 더하여지더라

sentences.original_text: for he was a good man
full of the Holy Spirit and of faith
And a great many people were added to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 매우 많은 사람들이 주께 더해졌습니다.
